page.title: 19Tourism around Gt.Coxwell
page.content: Many people visit Gt.Coxwell,usually to see the Great Tithe Barn and the church.It is quite common to see at least one car parked on the road out- side the Barn at any time during the day.Sometimes there are coachloads of visitors.Gt.Coxwell often features in History courses held at Oxford & at Denman College(Womens'Institute),& the students come & look at the village. Great Coxwell is very fortunate to be situated so close to the Cotswolds, White Horse Hill,The Ridgeway,Wayland Smithy,Oxford,the River Thames etc.
